Package gate.creole.numbers

This package contains a number of GATE PRs which attempt to annotate numbers appearing within documents.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnnotationConstants To ensure that all annotations/features created by the different number PRs use the same names this class holds constants specifying the correct values.
NumbersTagger A GATE PR which annotates numbers which appear as both words or numbers (or a combination) and determines their numeric value.
RomanNumeralsTagger A GATE PR which annotates Roman Numerals with their numeric value.
 

Package gate.creole.numbers Description

This package contains a number of GATE PRs which attempt to annotate numbers appearing within documents. As well as annotating the numbers the value of the number is determined and added as a feature on the annotation.

Author:
Mark A. Greenwood, Valentin Tablan, Thomas Heitz
See Also:
The GATE User Guide
